entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
